conclusion: Understand the flow of liquid through the baffles and how it is directed into the containers.
The baffles are labeled A, B, and C, and they are oriented in different directions.
Liquid will flow through baffles and be directed into one of the containers D, E, F, or G.
Baffle A: Liquid flows from the top left and is directed by the baffle.
Liquid will flow into the container aligned with the direction of baffle A.
Baffle B: Liquid flows from the top center and is directed by the baffle.
Liquid will flow into the container aligned with the direction of baffle B.
Baffle C: Liquid flows from the top right and is directed by the baffle.
Liquid will flow into the container aligned with the direction of baffle C.
Container D is aligned with the direction of the green baffle (A).
Container E is aligned with the direction of the pink baffle (B).
Container F is aligned with the direction of the yellow baffle (C).
Green liquid will flow through baffle A and into container D.
Pink liquid will flow through baffle B and into container E.
Yellow liquid will flow through baffle C and into container F.
Final answer: Green liquid flows into container D, pink liquid flows into container E, yellow liquid flows into container F.
